data.actual_result: Black screen appears, or sorta of.. Weirdammegradon. I can't explain, it seems weird, try it.
data.expected_result: Your list of servers should scroll up so you can place the flying icon downnn
data.steps_to_repro: - Try to move a server (choose the server as low as possible, but higher does work too)  - Move it up (but let your finger stay on Sort and Manage Servers, else it won't work)
